task.summary: Default task
Fixed a dumb error
Removed some unneeded default mod base cards. Added new cards Pluck & Button up.
Fixed some stuff with Pluck
New Cards Spontaneous Strike + DAMNATION
New Cards ReSeek and RiskyStrike
New card PuffUp
New card PuffUp
New card 16 Tons
Added cards Flashback, Retreat, ToolsOfTrickery, TwilightTone, WhiffOfMagic
Added cards Dig up junk, Zero Hero and Flashback
Custom Glyphs are here!
New cards: Meditation, Glamour, Focus Stab, Invocation, Glyph of Sight
oops forgot to add the pictures
Added three new Glyphs and cards they generate. Added Persistence and Iron Plumes.
Added new cards: Brilliance, Courage, Foil, GarbageCannon, SharpTalons and ShowOff
Fixed PluckAction and GarbageCannonAction
Worst commit in all of mankind. Added a bazillion of cards and made a metric ton of changes
New Card Impulse
New Card Jump cut and card rebalances
Some starter deck rebalance + Hopefully fixed Clairvoyance
Small jump cut fix to avoid infinites
